mapper.select: SELECT A.U_CD "종목코드", A.U_NM "종목이름" FROM FNS_U_MAST A WHERE (A.U_CD LIKE 'FI0%' OR A.U_CD LIKE 'S%')
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM FNI_STYLE_UNIV WHERE START_DT IN (SELECT MAX(START_DT) FROM FNI_STYLE_UNIV WHERE START_DT <= #{trd_dt}) AND U_CD = #{u_cd})
SELECT MIN(A.TRD_DT) TRD_DT FROM FNC_CALENDAR A WHERE A.TRD_DT >= (TO_DATE(#{dt}, 'YYYYMMDD') - #{interval}) AND A.OPEN_GB_STOCK = '0'
SELECT MAX(A.TRD_DT) TRD_DT FROM FNC_CALENDAR A WHERE A.TRD_DT <= (ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{dt}, 'YYYYMMDD'), -1 * #{interval})) AND A.OPEN_GB_STOCK = '0'
